document_data.mainbody:
hunrune was a small fishing village on the island of Snowdown.
This village was located across from the towns of Horstall and Kingsbay.
In 1359 DR,Dragon #362 provides an exact date for the events of Halls of the High King, which did not give an exact date within itself. Thauntiver the leader of The Broken Ring was living here, posing as a mere boat builder.
